title: riot kayle free skin
body: so do we have to play one game to get it or do we play more games

replies.body: Per the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you), as long as you play a game by the 19th you'll be eligible for a gift!  We'll also be posting updates on the status of these gifts being distributed [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Let me know if you have any questions.
